| History                 = The Golden Claws are a Japanese gang in NY City. They killed the leader of the [[Joy Boys (Earth-616)|Joy Boys]], who seeking revenge, met the Golden Claws in a park. [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]] and [[Leiko Wu (Earth-616)|Leiko Wu]] attempted to stop the gang fight, and during the fighting, one of the Joy Boys tried to shoot the Golden Claws' leader whom was saved by Shang-Chi, after which he convinced both gangs to stop fighting and return home.{{r|Master of Kung Fu Vol 1 91}}
